name: absolutevaluessumminimization
description: Given a sorted array of integers `a`, your task is to determine which element of `a` is _closest_ to all other values of `a`. In other words, find the element `x` in `a`, which minimizes the following sum: ``` abs(a[0] - x) + abs(a[1] - x) + ... + abs(a[a.length - 1] - x) ``` (where `abs` denotes the absolute value) If there are several possible answers, output the _smallest_ one.
